message.content:
{"id": "124067", "title": "When selecting an XML file, the application should support relative paths", "description": "When selecting an XML file, the application should support relative paths.", "OB": "Currently, when selecting an XML file, only the absolute path is supported.", "EB": "The application should be enhanced to support both relative and absolute paths when selecting an XML file.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the application and navigate to the report creation section.
2. Select an XML file and observe that only the absolute path is accepted.

Expected behavior:
The application should accept both relative and absolute paths when selecting an XML file."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '124067', 'title': 'Bug 124067When select the XML file, the relative path should be supported.', 'description': 'Bug 124067When select the XML file, the relative path should be supported. ', 'SR': ''}
